name: INSnoozeTasksIntentHandling
desc: The handler interface that snoozes tasks in a task list.

items.name: func resolveNextTriggerTime(for: INSnoozeTasksIntent, with: (INDateComponentsRangeResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the trigger of when to snooze tasks.

items.name: func confirm(intent: INSnoozeTasksIntent, completion: (INSnoozeTasksIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Confirms whether you can snooze the task.
